mapper.sql: to_char(ID) AS ID, VERNO_CTX, PAN, LOCAL_DATE, MERCHANTNO, TERMCODE, ACCFLAG, AVLBAL, TLOG_ID, AMTTXN, TRAN_DATE, TRAN_TIME, STAN, RRN, TXNCODE, TXNSRC, RSPCODE, TXNSTATUS, RESERVED1, RESERVED2, RESERVED3, RESERVED4
ORDER BY ID DESC, LOCAL_DATE DESC, TRAN_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CRDFEECKJFLOG (ID, VERNO_CTX, PAN, LOCAL_DATE, MERCHANTNO, TERMCODE, ACCFLAG, AVLBAL, TLOG_ID, AMTTXN, TRAN_DATE, TRAN_TIME, STAN, RRN, TXNCODE, TXNSRC, RSPCODE, TXNSTATUS) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vernoCtx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{localDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{termcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avlbal,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{tlogId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amttxn,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{tranDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stan,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rrn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txncode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{txnsrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rspcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{txnstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: UPDATE CRDFEECKJFLOG SET VERNO_CTX = #{vernoCtx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAN = #{pan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCAL_DATE = #{localDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANTNO = #{merchantno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TERMCODE = #{termcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCFLAG = #{accflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AVLBAL = #{avlbal,jdbcType=FLOAT}, TLOG_ID = #{tlogId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMTTXN = #{amttxn,jdbcType=FLOAT}, TRAN_DATE = #{tranDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAN_TIME = #{tranTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STAN = #{stan,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RRN = #{rrn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TXNCODE = #{txncode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TXNSRC = #{txnsrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RSPCODE = #{rspcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, TXNSTATUS = #{txnstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
